item.title: Audrey add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom." -- Aristotle

item.title: Audrey add a quote by David D. Burns
item.description: "There is only one person who could ever make you happy, and that person is you." -- David D. Burns

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Who is the happiest of men? He who values the merits of others, and in their pleasure takes joy, even as though 'twere his own. " -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Elisabeth Kübler-Ross
item.description: "People are like stained-glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within." -- Elisabeth Kübler-Ross

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it." -- Confucious

item.title: Audrey add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Max Lucado
item.description: "A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her." -- Max Lucado

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Max Lucado
item.description: "Faith is not the belief that God will do what you want. It is the belief that God will do what is right." -- Max Lucado

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Audrey add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Audrey add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Try a little harder to be a little better." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Let us never forget to pray. God lives. He is near. He is real. He is not only aware of us but cares for us. He is our Father. He is accessible to all who will seek Him." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "In all of living, have much fun and laughter. Life is to be enjoyed, not just endured." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "When I say do your best, I mean your very best. You are capable of so much more." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain." -- Bob Marley
